title: AmbarCoin
author: AmbarCoin
created_time: June 09, 2022, 01:07:49 AMLast edit: June 11, 2022, 09:01:36 PM by AmbarCoin
content: Ambar Coin will be released on Saturday, June 11, 2022 at 21:00 hrs Miami, Florida Time - 03:00 hrs Switzerland Time - 20:00 hrs at San Cristóbal, Chiapas Time                      SPECS Ticker Symbol AMBARCoin Type   SMART CONTRACT WITH METAMASK WALLETMax Coin Supply    70,000,000Initial Supply   3%   MEDIA Website (in working progress): http://www.ambarcoin.org Discord: https://discord.gg/XhRTeQVz38 EXPLORERBlockExplorer for the BNB Smart Chain (BSC): https://bscscan.com/token/0x77b5f80a5a9af810384941a05b0e0441c04113d2?a=0x03bb7d6FE6736628F71ea04494D45f0bf6ebaCB7TRANSLATIONSRules- translations must be an exact copy of this post and google translator is not accepted. Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Italian, Turkish, German, Swedish, Polish, CroatianOther language please send pm to George at discord channel.SALE STRUCTURE1.Join to our discord cannel and send pm to George in order to get your coins. Ask for updated amount adjusted to your cryptocurrency of your preference before send the coins to our wallet.2. We have to wait for 3 confirmations in case for btc, tracked by the txid that you’ll provide us3. Send your AMBAR metamask wallet4. Receive your coins to your metamask walletACCEPTED CRYPTOCURRENCIESBTC, LTC, ETH, BNBOther crypto please send pm to George at discord channelAMBAR ICO price:1 AMBAR =  0.50 usdIf you want physical coin its 140 usd each + shipment; in addition you get a bonus of 70 AMBAR for helping Simojovel CitizensMARKETINGPost announcement in Cryptocointalk: 30 AMBARPost in other altcoin forums: 30 AMBARTranslations: 40 AMBAR

comments.body: Hi guys! If you wanna meet the team, we're going to stay this weekend at San Cristóbal, Chiapas. We think is the perfect spot for the launch!
